title: Do not post any anti-Govt content on social media, tell kin too: TIFR to staff - The Indian Express
content: Do not post any anti-Govt content on social media, tell kin too: TIFR to staff  The Indian ExpressView Full coverage on Google News
description: "The DAE has set-ups across the country in different places. Photos or videos referred to in the letter could have been from any of these set-ups and then a universal directive might have been issued for all set-ups. In a few days, there could be more clarity on this," sources said.
